original_text: David and his men wept loudly. They continued to weep until they had no strength to weep any more.
korean_text: 다윗과 그와 함께 한 백성이 울 기력이 없도록 소리를 높여 울었더라

sentences.original_text: David and his men wept loudly
until they had no strength to weep any more
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 울 힘이 없을 때까지
